page.title: 02PSYCHIATRIC HOSPITAL CHESTER
page.content: THE OLDEST PART OF THE COUNTESS OF CHESTER HOSPITAL WAS BUILT IN 1829 FOR PAUPER LUNATICS.THE NEWEST PART OF THE HOSPITAL WAS BUILT 2 YEARS AGO.THERE ARE 3 HOSPITAL UNITS ON THE SAME SITE, THE PSYCHIATRIC WARD ,THE MATERNITY WARD OPENED IN 1972 AND THE GENERAL HOSPITAL OPENED IN 1984.THE PSYCHIATRIC HOSPITAL IS A FRIENDLY PLACE.THE 814 PATIENTS ARE TAUGHT TO HELP THEMSELVES,BY LEARNING HOW TO DRESS,AND GENERALLY LOOK AFTER THEIR OWN AFFAIRS. THERE ARE 833 STAFF,OF WHICH 10 ARE DOCTORS,483 NURSES AND THE REST CLEANERS,PORTERS ETC.PATIENTS ARE ALLOWED OUT TO SHOP ON THEIR OWN OR WITH STAFF.NONE OF THEIR ROOMS ARE LOCKED AT NIGHT.SOME WORK IN THE REHABILITATION CENTRE,OR IN THE LAUNDRY.THIS GIVES THEM CONFIDENCE, WHICH THEY LACK.
